屝字的基本解释

屝
fèi
古人称用草、麻、皮革做的鞋。

屝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《廣韻》扶沸切，去未，奉。］
“菲3”的被通假字。
粗鞋。多以皮、麻、草制作。参见“屝屨”。

屝字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屝； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页302第29
【集韻】【韻會】?父沸切，音㵒。【說文】履屬。从尸非聲。【釋名】草履曰屝。一曰不借。　又【揚子·方言】屝，麤屨也。絲作曰履，麻作曰屝。【左傳·僖四年】共其資糧屝屨。　又通作菲。【前漢·?法志】菲履赭衣。【註】菲，扶味切，與屝同。　【正字通】屝與扉厞別。

屝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
屝字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
coarse
fèi
The ancients called shoes made of grass, hemp, and leather.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèi］
["Guangyun" help to boil and cut, go to the end, Bong. ]
"Philippines 3" was passed falsely.
Thick shoes. It is mostly made of leather, hemp, and grass. See "屝屦".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[First Collection of Yin] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　屝; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 302 29
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Father boiling and cutting, sound 㵒. 【Said the text】Performance. Feisheng from the corpse. [Release name] Cao Lu said. One said not to borrow.　[Yangtze Dialect] 屝, also rough. Silk is called a shoe, and hemp is called a scorpion. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Four Years] A total of his resources.　Throughout again. [Previous Han·Fazhi] Fei's shoes and ocher clothes. [Note] Fei, Fu Wei cut, the same as 屝.　【Zhengzitong】Farewell and Farewell.
